# Government Tender Announcement: Sodium Iodide (NaI) Probes

## Notice Details

* Tender Title: PR6403 HT235-225451 Sodium Iodide (NaI) Probes
* Reference Number: WS4013768629-Doc4046467390
* Solicitation Number: WS4013768629
* Publication Date: 8 June 2023
* Closing Date and Time: 12 June 2023 (14:00:00 hours)
* Amendment Date: 12 June 2023

## Procedural Details

* The following tender announcement has been cancelled.
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price bid
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contracting Authority

* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Person: Mr. Cristian Ardila, "il-lui / he-him"
* Email: cristian.ardila@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Goods and Services

* The Department of Health (HC) is seeking Sodium Iodide (NaI) Probes.
* Procurement Category: Generic/ labouratory and scientific equipment (#41100000)
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
* End-User Entity: Department of Health (HC)
## Document Download

* The full announcement and supporting documents can be accessed via: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16529386?extsite=MTY1MjkzODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Confirmed Details
* Only the most important and relevant information was shared. In original entry
* Significant details which has been excluded:
* TenderNumber ( misses details including University tracing information)
* Period-end Date Activities Finished Signing Accomplished Event From Announced
